content:
Russian troops attacked Berislav with shock drones once again. Two people were injured in the discharge of explosives.

About thisinformsKherson Ova.

It is noted that a 55-year-old man suffered an explosive injury and a set of wreckage of his leg.

In addition, a 43-year-old resident was diagnosed with injury, traumatic brain injury, head and leg injury.

“Both victims were taken to the hospital in an average severity. They were provided with medical care, ”the message reads.

Recall, occupiersRost -stringHigher education institutions in Kherson: OVA showed consequences.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kherson the enemyHe kissedIn the port infrastructure, two dead per day.
